title: Educational Content Package Schema
description: Schema for validating educational content packages with enhanced metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for the educational content package

description.description: Detailed description of the educational content

page_url.description: URL to the Wikipedia page or source

image_url.description: URL or path to the educational image

license.description: License information for the content (e.g., CC BY-SA 4.0)

attribution.description: Attribution information for the content source

learning_objectives.description: Array of learning objectives for the educational content

difficulty_level.description: Difficulty level of the educational content

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the content was created

image_quality.description: Quality level of the educational image
